body.p: The UK-based Gentoo developers are pleased to announce that the Gentoo UK 2005 Conference will be held on Saturday 12th March 2005 at the University of Salford, with social events the night before and the night after.

The theme for this year's Conference is "Success with Gentoo", and we're running both a Speakers Programme and a Demonstration Programme. Â We're inviting developers and users alike who wish to take part in the programme to submit their proposals before 31st December 2004.
For more details, see the Conference website and discuss the event in our forums.
